bill.title: Physician Discipline; Conditions; Hawaii Medical Board; Reciprocal Discipline
bill.description: Authorizes the Hawaii Medical Board to impose the same disciplinary action against a licensee as was taken by another state or federal agency. Establishes conditions for the disciplinary action. Prohibits the licensee from practicing until a final order of discipline is issued if the licensee has been prohibited from practicing in another state. (SD1)

history.action: Pending introduction.
Introduced and Pass First Reading.
Referred to HLT, CPC, referral sheet 4
Bill scheduled to be heard by HLT on Wednesday, 02-03-16 8:30AM in House conference room 329.

The committees on HLT recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 9 Ayes: Representative(s) Belatti, Creagan, Hashem, Jordan, Kobayashi, Morikawa, Oshiro, Fukumoto Chang, Tupola; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
Reported from HLT (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 133-16), recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to CPC.
Passed Second Reading and referred to the committee(s) on CPC with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Tupola excused (1).
Bill scheduled to be heard by CPC on Thursday, 02-11-16 5:00PM in House conference room 325.
The committee(s) on CPC recommend(s) that the measure be deferred until 02-17-16 2:00PM.
Bill scheduled for decision making on Wednesday, 02-17-16 9:30AM in conference room 329.

The committees on CPC recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 12 Ayes: Representative(s) McKelvey, Woodson, Belatti, Brower, Creagan, Har, Hashem, C. Lee, Nakashima, San Buenaventura, Takayama, Fukumoto Chang; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 4 Excused: Representative(s) Kawakami, Oshiro, Yamane, McDermott.
Reported from CPC (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 924-16) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Third Reading.
Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 03-08-16.
Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 1 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 292).
Passed First Reading.
Referred to CPH, JDL.
The committee(s) on CPH has scheduled a public hearing on 03-16-16 9:00AM in conference room 229.

The committee(s) on CPH recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in CPH were as follows: 5 Aye(s): Senator(s) Baker, Kidani, Espero, Nishihara, Ruderman; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Ihara, Slom.
Reported from CPH (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2903) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to JDL.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to JDL.
The committee(s) on JDL will hold a public decision making on 03-31-16 9:30AM in conference room 016.

The committee(s) on JDL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in JDL were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Keith-Agaran, Gabbard, Kim, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 3 Excused: Senator(s) Shimabukuro, K.Kahele, L. Thielen.
Reported from JDL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 3466) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading.
One Day Notice 04-12-16.
Report adopted; Passed Third Reading. Ayes, 24; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 1 (Senator(s) Slom). Transmitted to House.
Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 600) in amended form (SD 1).
House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).
Received notice of disagreement (Hse. Com. No. 609).
Senate Conferees Appointed: Baker Chair; Keith-Agaran Co-Chair; Kidani.
House Conferees Appointed: Belatti, McKelvey Co-Chairs; Creagan, Tupola.
Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 652).
Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 611).
